_header: Look his woning be clean I-dight
Subjects: sermons, verse in; Christ, love toward; Christ, thanksgivings to; advice, spiritual
_description: On offering hospitality to Christ, in a Latin sermon, Qui custos domini sui gloriabitur, by Friar Nicholas Philip — two couplets

BodLatTheD1.Transcription:
loke his wonnyng be clene diȝhtloke his mete be made a
                    ryȝhtloke he hafe goode cumpanye& loke he hafe good
                    mynistalcye
BodLatTheD1.Editions:
Fletcher,  Alan J. 
             “Selected Verses from Bodleian Library MS Lat. Th. D.1.” 
             Neuphilologische Mitteilungen
         90 (1989): 163-6: 164.
